responsibilities: Provide clinical data management support for clinical studies.
Perform data management activities from study concept through closure, including data collection, tracking, and cleaning.
Develop study materials and conduct study closeout activities.
Assist the assigned research team in submitting and maintaining regulatory documents.
qualifications: Ability to manage clinical data effectively.
Proficiency in data collection, tracking, and cleaning.
Experience with study material development and study closeout activities.
Familiarity with regulatory document submission and maintenance.
Experience using REDCap, Tableau, and SQLServer.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills listed are focused on clinical data management for clinical studies. The responsibilities include providing clinical data management support, performing data management activities, developing study materials, and assisting with regulatory documents. The skills required include managing clinical data, proficiency in data collection, tracking, and cleaning, and experience with study material development and regulatory document submission. The tools mentioned are REDCap, Tableau, and SQLServer, which are commonly used for data management and analysis.

There is no mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The job appears to be centered around clinical data management and does not involve working with AI technologies related to language models or generative AI.
